thag2.47:0.4_0: this is how we used to live.
thag2.47:1.2_0: impales itself on its own stake.
thag2.47:1.4_0: there’s a stake, a chopping block.
thag2.47:2.1_0: I declare you the demon mind!
thag2.47:2.2_0: I declare you the insidious mind!
thag2.47:2.3_0: You’ve found the teacher so hard to find—
thag2.47:2.4_0: don’t lead me away from the goal.
thag2.47:2.5_0: ... the senior monk who is junior, as a senior monk ...
